description: Trystan Bull is a well known and beloved professor of French.  He spends late nights working on new techniques for teaching his students.  He's especially popular among the female students.  But no one likes him as much as Nikki Lippz.  In fact Nikki has devised a plan to get a little alone time with Professor Bull.  She's shown up at his office, late enough to know he won't be dealing with anyone else.  Trystan concerned to hear of an upcoming French test Nikki has with another Professor.  Nikki hasn't studied a lick and she's hoping Trystan will find it in his heart to give her a private lesson.  He doesn't hesitate to give this eager student exactly what she's after...his swollen cock!  Nikki's been salivating at the idea of tasting Professor Bull's dick for a while now.  Watch Trystan enjoy her warm mouth pleasuring his rock hard erection.  Then see the good Professor slam that massive boner into young Nikki the way a caring instructor should.  C'est BON!Enjoy!
title: Pardon My French
